jd: From: Suresh Babu, Teamware Solutions suresh.b@twsol.com Reply to: suresh.b@twsol.com Position: Oracle Data Integrator (ODI)Location: New Port Beach CA (Onsite)Job Description 9+ yrs of proven experience in design and development of Data Warehouse solutions, ETL, Software Development and system integration projectsMinimum 6 yrs of strong exp in Oracle Data Integrator(ODI) with knowledge of data modeling and ETL designMinimum 3-4 yrs of strong exp in OBI-APPS(Financials analytics modules)Must have 1-2 yrs of exp in OBIEEGood querying skills on Oracle database with ability to understand and debug PL/SQL procedureGood knowledge of Enterprise application data structure(Oracle PeopleSoft)Experience of performance tuning of mappings and able to tune mappings at ETL level and provide suggestion of tuning at database levelAbility to design ETL unit test cases and debug ETL mappingsStrong knowledge and expand implementation of Oracle Data warehouse concepts SCD, Aggregates, Hierarchy tables, Snapshot fact tables etc.,Ability to work with functional groups an different level of employees to achieve results effectively and professionallyStrong follow-up skills: ability to organize applicable department timelines and follow up with internal and external customer needsStrong organization skills, ability to accomplish multiple tasks within the agreed upon timeframes through effective prioritization of duties d functions in a fast paced environment. --“Email is the best way to reach me”Thanks & RegardsSuresh Babu | Talent AcquisitionTeamware Solutions Inc |8951 Cypress Waters Blvd, Suite #1092, Dallas Texas 75019 | : suresh.b@twsol.com LinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/in/lorvensureshbabu/
